title: Merchant programs: eligibility and onboarding
content:
Merchant programs: eligibility and onboarding

Assess which AI/commerce programs you can join and what they require.

Learning goal

  • Compare key programs (ChatGPT/Copilot/Google).
  • Create a requirement checklist.

Why it matters

  • No eligibility, no presence.
  • Onboarding errors delay visibility.

Explanation

  • Requirements: feed quality, policy, region, brand/GTIN, price/stock.
  • Onboarding: verification, domain, support contact.

Examples

  • Good: checklist per program with status.
  • Poor: “We’ll apply later” with no documentation.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Create a table: Program | Region | Requirement | Status | Owner.
  2. Fill for the three main platforms.

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Mark 3 gaps and tasks for onboarding.

Self-check

  • Program table ready.
  • Gaps identified.
  • Owners set.

Optional deepening

  • OpenAI merchants: https://chatgpt.com/merchants
  • Copilot merchant: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot/blog/2025/04/18/introducing-the-copilot-merchant-program/
